CANDIDATE_IMAGES.DESCRIPTION: Offer voters a comprehensive impression of candidates by including photos in the ballot.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Integrate photos of candidates or voting options into your ballot and offer voters a comprehensive impression of the candidates running in the election. This enables you to present candidates in a more personal light, which in turn simplifies the voting experience and promotes voter turnout.
Here’s how it works:
Upload photos as uniformly sized image files.
Your image files can be:
-formatted as either a .jpg or .png.
 – up to 1 MB in size.

CANDIDATE_IMAGES.NAME: Photos in the ballot

CUSTOM_COLOR_SCHEME.DESCRIPTION: Choose a color scheme for your online election that makes it instantly recognizable.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Personalize the POLYAS online voting system by changing the default color scheme. This is a great way to make your election instantly recognizable. 
Here’s how it works: with POLYAS color schemes you can change how the online voting system interface appears to users. Your chosen color scheme will then appear in the ballot background, text and buttons.

CUSTOM_COLOR_SCHEME.NAME: Select color scheme

CUSTOM_DESIGN.DESCRIPTION: Customize your online election and integrate your corporate design into the voting system.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Design the POLYAS online voting system to match your organization’s unique color scheme. 
Make your online election instantly recognizable and enhance your voters’ sense of belonging to the organization. 
Here’s how it works: simply customize the following elements of the online voting system: - Background color -Text color – Button color Your logo will also be integrated into the system. All you need are the HEX codes of your designs and your logo in .png or .jpg format.

CUSTOM_DESIGN.NAME: Your design in the online voting system

CUSTOM_LOGO.DESCRIPTION: Your logo in the online voting system

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Customize your online election by adding your logo to the POLYAS online voting system.
 Inserted logos appear at the top of each page of the online election and boost your voters’ sense of belonging with the election process. 
Here’s how it works: 
Upload your logo as an image file. Your image file can be: 
- formatted as either a .jpg or .png.
 – up to 1 MB in size.

CUSTOM_LOGO.NAME: Your logo in the online voting system

CUSTOM_TEXTS.DESCRIPTION: Customize the user information shown to your voters in the online voting system.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value: Customize all text and add supplementary information to offer voters a more detailed insight into the election. Use text content to provide information surrounding the election, helpful links and much, much more. This is a great way to personalize the voting experience and make your election instantly recognizable. Keen to get started with customizing the online voting system text? Contact a POLYAS election expert today!

CUSTOM_TEXTS.NAME: Customized text in the online voting system

CUSTOM_URL.DESCRIPTION: Forward voters to a website of your choosing once they’ve submitted their ballots.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
You decide which webpage voters see after submitting their votes in the election. 
This could be your home page, a landing page for the election or simply a ‘thank you for taking part’ page.

CUSTOM_URL.NAME: Final page after voting

CUSTOM_VOTER_COVER_LETTER.DESCRIPTION: Personalize communications with voters by creating individually tailored election notifications.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value: Edit the content of election notification e-mails, reminders or thank you e-mails to offer voters a tailor-made voting experience. Ready to get started with personalized election notification e-mails? Our POLYAS election experts are happy to help. Contact us today!

CUSTOM_VOTER_COVER_LETTER.NAME: Personalized election notifications

INVITATIONS.NAME: Weitere Benutzer einladen

LIST_ELECTION.DESCRIPTION: Use our handy ballot template to simplify your next list election.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Save time creating your list election in the online configurator by using the POLYAS ballot template.
Choose one of the following list elections:
1)	Closed list election: voters cast their votes for a single, fixed list
2)	Semi-open list election: votes can be distributed among candidates in a single list
3)	Open list election: votes can be allocated to candidates across all lists

LIST_ELECTION.NAME: List election ballots

LOGIN_DATA_BY_MAIL.DESCRIPTION: Distribute notifications for your online election by post.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Login data can be sent to eligible voters by post. Some organizations require postal distribution of election notifications in order to comply with online election regulations. Together with the POLYAS Partner Network we offer a convenient process for compliance with all required data protection guidelines. 
Here’s how it works: you give the postal addresses of all eligible voters to the printing service provider and we give them the encrypted voter login details. Printing, enveloping and posting all in one place. Contact a POLYAS election expert for a no-obligation quote!

LOGIN_DATA_BY_MAIL.NAME: Post voter login details

MAIL_SERVER.DESCRIPTION: Boost voter turnout at your next election by sending out reminder e-mails to voters.
MAIL_SERVER.NAME: Mailserver

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value: Track voter turnout over the course of the election by subscribing to our daily e-mail report.

MULTIPLE_LANGUAGES.DESCRIPTION: Carry out a multilingual online election with translated ballots and user information.

ERRORS.DESTRUCTIVE_OPERATION: This change may delete or modify data. Do you really want to continue?
ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_ENABLED_LANGUAGES: For this feature at least 2 languages have to be enabled.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Speak to voters in their own language by offering multiple language options for the ballot and user information in the POLYAS online voting system. Collect and analyse all results in a single database. 
Here’s how it works: you can create a multilingual election by adding more languages to the ballot. At POLYAS you can choose English and German as standard languages.
TIP: Enter your own translations or include additional languages. Contact a POLYAS election expert for a free consultation!

MULTIPLE_LANGUAGES.NAME: Multilingual online elections

PIN_TAN_EXPORT.DESCRIPTION: Export voter login details and send them out to voters over a medium of your choosing.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Don’t have the e-mail addresses of all eligible voters? You’d like to send election login data over an alternative medium? Some organizations require election notifications to be distributed via post. 
Here’s how it works: simply export the encrypted login data from the online voting configurator as an excel-file and include it in your election notifications.

PIN_TAN_EXPORT.NAME: Export voter login details

REMINDER.DESCRIPTION: Boost voter turnout at your next election by sending out reminder e-mails to voters.

LONG_DESCRIPTION_ITEMS.value:
Encourage your voters to participate by sending e-mail reminders during the election. Here’s how it works: choose a time within the election period to send out election reminders.
TIP: Group your voters into segments in the electoral roll according to electoral district, age, place of residence etc. By doing so you can tailor your reminders to fit each voter segment’s needs and boost both election turnout and voters’ sense of belonging to the organization.

REMINDER.NAME: E-mail election reminders
